all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But blessed are they who are faithful and endure, whether in life or in death, for they shall inherit eternal life.
Doctrine and Covenants 50:5
Quote of the Day
"As we walk in the meekness of the Lord’s Spirit, we will avoid and overcome pride and have peace in Him."
David A. Bednar | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
